subject: Soccer
UEFA Europa League
lead_paragraph: The Spanish club Sevilla won the Europa League for a record fourth time, getting two goals from Carlos Bacca in a 3-2 win over Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk.
snippet: The Spanish club Sevilla won the Europa League for a record fourth time, getting two goals from Carlos Bacca in a 3-2 win over Dnipro Dnipropetrovsk.
